text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump He has NEVER done that - why start now. Donald Trump is disbanding the #COVID19 task force because he thinks Economy is more important than USA citizens lives. Donald Trump is wrong - and the voters will show him that at polls. #Lifeovereconomy
